data.name: AkaziMC
data.description:
🔥 AkaziMC – The Ultimate Minecraft Survival Experience!
Looking for an EagerCraft server that's more than just survival? AkaziMC brings together Java Edition and Eaglercraft players in a dynamic, fun, and competitive world!

🌍 Why AkaziMC?
Cross-Platform Support: Play on Java Edition or Eaglercraft without missing a beat
Survival Mode: Classic survival with custom tweaks
PvP Arenas: Test your combat skills in fair, challenging battles
Daily Rewards: Log in every day for bonuses and exclusive items
Economy System: Earn, trade, and manage your wealth
Team Play: Form or join teams to strategize and dominate

💡 Community Perks
Active, friendly community
Balanced gameplay for fair competition
Regular events and challenges

🌐 Connection Info
Java Edition: akazimc.eagler.host

Eaglercraft: wss://akazimc.eagler.host or wss://akazimc.xx.kg

Supports: 1.8 and 1.12

✨ Step into AkaziMC today – build, fight, and explore with players from around the world!
